item.title: Lets make this easier.. How do I get into my server source?
item.dc:creator: @Hells_Spawn Hells_Spawn
item.description:
@Hells_Spawn wrote:

Aight in the tutorials… It says

You will also need to set a variables called “classpath”. Make a new variable and give it the name classpath. No add this in for it’s value:
“C:\Program Files\Java\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin”

Ok now go into your server source (if you dont have a rar uncompressor you can download 7zip at this link: 7zip, or you can download rar uncompresser at this link: WinRar. Ok now you can right click the compressed source and click “extract here”),
and now when in your server srouce, right click compile.bat and click “edit”. Then erase everything in it and put this in it’s place:

I did the classpath and everything… and downloaded the files there so I could get to do what I had to do… But Now I dunno wtf I am doing… I still need to extract a compressed file then I need to get into my server source…
It says it there…[br][size=1]Posted on: March 10, 2007, 10:27:27 PM[/size][hr][quote=“blitz_9100, post:3, topic:66641”]ok open the runserver in your server source look at the port the number after :’
and change the port # in moparscape and put any user name and pass in and leave the ip blank empty if has something in it[/quote]

I dunno how to get into the runserver… where I go to get into it?..

Read full topic
